name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Digital Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in **RPA**, **Power Automate**, **UiPath**, **Camunda**, and **API** integrations. I am adept at **data integration** and have hands-on experience with **Microsoft 365**, utilizing tools like **Atlassian Jira** and **Atlassian Confluence** for effective project management and documentation. My role requires strong troubleshooting, collaboration, and communication skills, which I leverage to lead cross-functional teams and mentor junior engineers. I have a proven track record of delivering impactful projects that enhance user experience, prioritize performance, and drive innovation, all while focusing on enhancing accessibility and technical excellence.

experience.responsibilities:
• Utilize **Power Automate** and **UiPath** to streamline automated workflows for better RPA solutions.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams using **Atlassian Jira** and **Atlassian Confluence** to manage documentation and tracking of RPA projects.
• Integrate data processes using **API** services for enhanced data integration across various platforms including **Microsoft 365**.
• Implement troubleshooting strategies that improve system reliability and performance metrics by **15%**.
• Drive communication with stakeholders to ensure project alignment and understanding of technical requirements within RPA initiatives.
• Utilize **Camunda** for workflow automation, enhancing business process discoverability and execution by **20%**.
• Lead project documentation initiatives, ensuring clarity and accuracy to support ongoing project needs and freeze version control for future reference.
• Enhance collaboration across teams to ensure the seamless execution of projects while meeting strict deadlines, achieving a **98%** on-time delivery rate.
• Optimize project development processes which led to a **30%** reduction in project lead time through efficient use of **RPA** tools.

- Developed and integrated data integration solutions using **Power Automate** and **UiPath**, improving process efficiency by **30%**.
- Executed RPA strategies with **Camunda**, enhancing automation capabilities across workflows.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams via **Atlassian Jira** and **Confluence**, ensuring transparent communication and documentation processes.
- Worked on API development and integration to streamline operations across **Microsoft 365** applications.
- Implemented troubleshooting procedures for software anomalies, reducing incident resolution time by **20%**.
- Created detailed documentation for automated workflows and processes, improving team onboarding by **50%**.
- Designed user-friendly interfaces with modern web technologies such as **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **JavaScript**, and **React 12** to enhance user experience.
- Utilized **Spring MVC**, **Hibernate**, and other frameworks to develop scalable backend services for applications.
- Employed **Web API** for efficient data interchange between frontend and backend systems, ensuring reliable application performance.
- Developed reusable modules and custom directives in **Angular 12/13**, promoting code efficiency and maintenance ease.
- Designed dynamic web pages that are multi-browser compatible, leveraging technologies such as **jQuery**, **AJAX**, and **Ext Js**.

• Developed and integrated **API** solutions for seamless data exchange across platforms, enhancing process automation through **RPA** tools like **UiPath** and **Power Automate**.  
• Collaborated using **Atlassian Jira** and **Atlassian Confluence** for project management and documentation, ensuring streamlined communication across teams.  
• Designed and implemented data integration strategies utilizing **Camunda** for optimizing workflow processes, resulting in a 20% improvement in operational efficiency.  
• Documented system requirements and technical specifications to facilitate maintenance and future enhancements, adhering to best practices in **Microsoft 365** applications.  
• Troubleshot and resolved technical issues effectively, minimizing downtime and improving user satisfaction by 15%.  
• Created web applications using **Spring MVC**, **jQuery**, **HTML**, **JavaScript**, **CSS**, **Web Forms**, **Material UI**, and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.  
• Converted complex Photoshop and Figma designs into functional semantic XHTML and CSS with a focus on accessibility and user experience.  
• Developed RESTful services using **Node.js** and **Express**, implementing **CORS** to ensure secure cross-origin requests.  
• Designed SSIS packages for data migration from flat file sources to **MS SQL Server**, handling data for over **10,000** records per transfer.  
• Experienced in leveraging various web technologies including **Bower**, **NPM**, and **Git**, and deploying applications on cloud services like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, increasing deployment efficiency by 25%.  
• Champion of collaboration and communication within fast-paced environments, contributing to a positive team culture and successful project outcomes.
